short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide all images of Benjamin Netanyahu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Many images of our prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu can be found on Israel news websites. Despite articles criticizing him and opposing his policies, readers still see images of him every where.

With this extension, I simply remove images from the website that contain "alt" with the term "Benjamin Netanyahu".

As a result, readers will be able to read the articles without seeing the images.
